means: 关心政治的，关心社会的

sentence.Network_en: He was concerned with the enhancement of the human condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他关心人类生存环境的改善。

sentence.Network_en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentence.Network_en: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

entry.def: If you are concerned to do something, you want to do it because you think it is important.

example.ex: We were very concerned to keep the staff informed about what we were doing.
example.tran: 我们很注重让员工随时了解我们正在做的事情。

means.word_mean: 1. feeling or showing worry or solicitude;

sentences.sentence: "we feel concerned about accomplishing the task at hand"
"greatly concerned not to disappoint a small child"

means.word_mean: 2. involved in or affected by or having a claim to or share in;

sentences.sentence: "an enterprise in which three men are concerned"
"factors concerned in the rise and fall of epidemics"
"the interested parties met to discuss the business"

means.word_mean: 3. in relation (or in regard) to; especially as in the phrases;

sentences.sentence: "all those concerned in the bribery case have been identified"
"named three officials implicated in the plot"
"an innocent person implicated by circumstances in a crime"

auth_sentence.content: EU is concerned that confessions were obtained under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content: EU is concerned that confessions were obtained under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: EU is concerned that confessions were obtained under duress.

auth_sentence.content: This is a very emotional time for all concerned.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a very emotional time for all concerned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a very emotional time for all concerned.

auth_sentence.content: I am concerned about three aspects of the plot.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am concerned about three aspects of the plot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am concerned about three aspects of the plot.

stems_affixes.word_buile: concern[v.关系到 n.关心]+ed……的→adj.关心的, 有关的
discern[v.辨别;区分]+ible能……的→adj.能够分辨的
con共同+cern搞清,区别→共同搞清楚→关心
discern[v.辨别;区分]+ment表名词→n.辨别能力
con共同+cern搞清,区别→共同搞清楚→关心
dis分开+cern搞清,区别→分开搞清→区别

Sentence.sentence: concerned about the interests of the workforce
In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture
Ellen Millender at Reed College in Portland is concerned that technology will take the place ofteaching or analysis.
The Supreme Court is likely to persuade the parties concerned to work out a settlement
In Japan, too, researchers are concerned about cell phone addiction.

means.word_mean: 担心的, 烦恼的, 忧虑的

sentences.en: We all concerned for her safety.
sentences.cn: 我们都很担心她的安全。

sentences.en: They appeared completely unconcerned about what they had done.
sentences.cn: 看来他们完全不在乎自己的所作所为。

sentences.en: Naturally we were concerned for him when we heard of the accident.
sentences.cn: 当我们听到那意外事件时, 自然地为他担忧。
